swivel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to turn around quickly and face a different direction, or to make something do this
swivel.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Anna swivelled round to face him.
She swivelled her head round to watch what was happening.
Danny swiveled his chair away from me.
swivel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an object that joins two parts of something and helps it to turn around
